name: He Runs, You Jump
description:
He Runs, You Jump

A procedural generated infinite runner where you have to help my dog Indy to collect as many coins as you can and beat the highscore!

This is my very first "completed game", realized for the LowRezJam 2021 game jam.
I used Godot to make it and it was a learning process, in the 2 weeks the game jam gave us I made a lot of mistakes but I built a game that is playable.
There wasn't tho too much time for game testing, so the procedural generation is sometimes iffy.. you may run into impossible situations where you can't do anything else than hear the game over sound :D
